title: Why do I love Khushi? - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A. Khushi represents everything you want in your life right now. Oxytocin also plays a huge factor of course but the real reason is the desperation to be accepted and nurtured in this modern world. Love is everlasting, because it's the one drug that truly placated our hollow lives.
Don't love khushi who told you to live her idiot just be single and flirt with her only otherwise khushi will take all your khushi and you will become dukhi.
